api_list.name: Extract infos from the review or sentence

required_parameters.name: review
required_parameters.default: The screen of the IPhone is awesome!

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://opinion-mining.p.rapidapi.com/extract/{review}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "opinion-mining.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
